Introduction

H.O.T (short for High-five Of Teenagers) was a five-member boy group under SM Entertainment. They officially debuted on September 7, 1996 with their first album "We Hate All Kinds of Violence". They later disbanded in May 2001.

Almost 22 years later, they held a reunion concert through the variety show Infinite Challenge in February of 2018.
